trans-unit.source: Provides information about a row of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell" /> objects to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações sobre a linha de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell" /> para aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: Windows Forms includes built-in accessibility support that allows your program to work with accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Windows Forms inclui suporte interno de acessibilidade que permite que o programa funcione com aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: Examples of accessibility client applications include screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities.
trans-unit.target: Exemplos de aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade incluem utilitários ampliador e Revisor de tela, utilitários de entrada de voz, teclados na tela, dispositivos de entrada alternativos e os utilitários de aprimoramento de teclado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject> class inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class to provide information about a row of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> objects to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject> classe herda o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> classe para fornecer informações sobre uma linha de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> objetos para aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: Each class that represents a visual part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>—such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>—also contains a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> to provide information about the containing class and perform actions on behalf of accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Cada classe que representa uma parte do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>— como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>— também contém uma classe que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> para fornecer informações sobre a classe continente e executar ações em nome dos aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: There are instances when you will want to provide additional information, such as the name or description of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Há ocasiões em que você deve fornecer informações adicionais, como o nome ou descrição do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle, para aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways of providing this additional information.
trans-unit.target: Há duas maneiras de fornecer essas informações adicionais.

trans-unit.source: To provide limited accessibility information for existing controls, set the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A> property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Para fornecer informações de acessibilidade limitada para controles existentes, defina o controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A> valores de propriedade, que serão relatados para aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: You should change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> property values only in rare situations, such as if you make a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> look like a list.
trans-unit.target: Você deve alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> valores de propriedade somente em situações raras, como se você tornar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> a aparência de uma lista.

trans-unit.source: Occasionally, you might require more accessibility information or different accessibility actions to be included with your custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: Ocasionalmente, você pode exigir mais informações sobre acessibilidade ou ações diferentes de acessibilidade para ser incluído no personalizados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.

trans-unit.source: To customize accessibility, you can write your own class that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> classes and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para personalizar a acessibilidade, você pode escrever sua própria classe que deriva de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> classes e substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are writing a custom row header cell that implements unique custom actions, such as special hit testing within your cell, you should create a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.DataGridViewRowHeaderCellAccessibleObject> class and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você estiver escrevendo uma célula de cabeçalho de linha personalizado que implementa exclusivas ações personalizadas, como o teste de clique especiais dentro de sua célula, você deve criar uma classe que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.DataGridViewRowHeaderCellAccessibleObject> classe e substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> exposes its data structure by using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole> values to define the data table hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> expõe sua estrutura de dados usando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole> valores para definir os dados de tabela hierarquia.

trans-unit.source: For more information on exposing data tables to Microsoft Active Accessibility, see "Exposing Data Tables through Microsoft Active Accessibility" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a exposição de tabelas de dados para acessibilidade ativa da Microsoft, consulte "Expor dados de tabelas por meio de Microsoft Active Accessibility" na biblioteca MSDN em http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject" /> class without setting the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject" /> sem definir a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that owns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject" />
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> que possui o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject" />

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject" /> class, setting the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject" /> definindo a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> para o valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location and size of the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o local e o tamanho do objeto acessível.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds of the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os limites do objeto acessível.

trans-unit.source: For more information about this property, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre essa propriedade, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> não foi definida.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the accessible child.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do filho acessível.

trans-unit.source: Returns the child accessible object corresponding to the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o objeto acessível filho correspondente para o índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that represents the column header at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> que representa o cabeçalho da coluna no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The order of the child accessible objects that represent a column header corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> properties of the columns.
trans-unit.target: A ordem dos objetos acessíveis filho que representam um cabeçalho de coluna corresponde do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> propriedades das colunas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> não foi definida.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of children belonging to the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o número de filhos que pertencem ao objeto acessível.

trans-unit.source: The number of child accessible objects belonging to the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: O número de objetos filhos acessíveis que pertencem ao objeto acessível.

trans-unit.source: The number of child accessible objects that belong to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject> corresponds to the number of visible columns in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: O número de objetos filho acessíveis que pertencem ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject> corresponde ao número de colunas visíveis no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.GetChildCount%2A> method includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell> in the count of child accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> for `true`, o método <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.GetChildCount%2A> incluirá o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell> na contagem de objetos acessíveis filho.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> não foi definida.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do objeto acessível.

trans-unit.source: The string "Top Row".
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres "Linha superior".

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation" />.

trans-unit.source: Navigates to another accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Navega para outro objeto acessível.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that represents the object at the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> que representa o objeto no valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> method will return for each parameter value.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir descreve o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> método será retornado para cada valor de parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Parameter value
trans-unit.target: Valor do parâmetro

trans-unit.source: Return value
trans-unit.target: Valor retornado

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Next> or
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Next> ou

trans-unit.source: An accessible object that represents the first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that is a data row in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto acessível que representa o primeiro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> que é uma linha de dados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: An accessible object that represents the first column header in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto acessível que representa o primeiro cabeçalho de coluna no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A> property is set to `true`, the accessible object represents the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A> está definida como `true`, representa o objeto acessível a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell>.

trans-unit.source: An accessible object that represents the column header for the last visible column.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto acessível que representa o cabeçalho de coluna para a última coluna visível.

trans-unit.source: All other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation> values
trans-unit.target: Todos os outros <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation> valores

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> não foi definida.

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: para chamar código não gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that contains the row of column headers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> que contém a linha dos cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that contains the row of column headers.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> que contém a linha de cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property has already been set.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> já foi definida.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o pai do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject" /> that represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject" /> que representa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> não foi definida.

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: para chamar código não gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the role of the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a função do objeto acessível.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole.Row" /> value.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole.Row" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of an accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de um objeto acessível.

trans-unit.source: The string "Top Row".
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres "Linha superior".

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Value%2A> property is the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Value%2A> propriedade é o mesmo que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Name%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: para chamar código não gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
